description: a(n)=T(n,n), array T as in A049687. Also a(n)=T(2n,2n), array T given by A049639.
formula: a(n) is related to the sequence b(n) = |{(x, y): gcd(x, y) = 1, 1<=x, y<=n}| (A018805) as follows: a(n) = b(n - 1) + 2 (for n > 1). - Shawn Westmoreland (westmore(AT)math.utexas.edu), Jun 11 2003
author: _Clark Kimberling_
